primary.family: Inter, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif
primary.notes: Grotesk/Geometric sans for high legibility and bold headlines.

secondary.family: JetBrains Mono, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Consolas, monospace
secondary.notes: Monospace for system logs, telemetry meters, and technical notes.

notes: Increase letter-spacing for body text on e‑ink to improve legibility.
Favor bolder weights for headlines; avoid ultra‑thin strokes.
Use generous leading (1.5x) for body copy when grayscale rendering may blur text.
